sentences.english: But as a local born and bred Liverpudlian person.
sentences.chinese: 但作爲一名土生土長的利物浦人。

sentences.english: Liverpool, meanwhile, are monitoring the young Preston North End midfielder Adam Barton.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦對普瑞斯頓的中場巴頓密切關注中。

sentences.english: The bins will be installed in central London and Liverpool in October.
sentences.chinese: 十月份，這種垃圾桶將被安裝在倫敦市中心和利物浦。

sentences.english: Lazio midfielder Gaby Mudingayi admits he's aware Liverpool are following him.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧中場穆丁加伊承認他知道利物浦正在追逐他。

sentences.english: Source: Goal. com"Olympiacos announce the acquisition of Liverpool's Spanish international Albert Riera."
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹亞科斯宣佈簽下利物浦的西班牙球星裏埃拉。

sentences.english: It was very difficult for Pepe to achieve what he's already done in one year at Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 在利物浦頭年的成功對雷納來說難度很大。

sentences.english: Liverpool chalked up yet another home victory against Arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦隊又一次刷新了本地戰勝阿勝納隊的紀錄。

sentences.english: XJTLU's Masters degrees are validated by the University of Liverpool (UK).
sentences.chinese: 合格畢業生將被授予英國利物浦大學碩士學位。

sentences.english: Liverpool are trying to thrash out a deal with Real Madrid to land Ruud van Nistelrooy on a six-month loan next week.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦正在嘗試與皇馬討論下個星期租借範尼六個月。

sentences.english: In May 1915, the ship left New York City for Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 一九一五年五月，這艘郵輪從紐約市開回利物浦。

sentences.english: The Frenchman has been transfer listed for more than a season following Diego Cavalieri's move to Liverpool in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 法國人轉會到利物浦比卡瓦雷利要早一個賽季。

sentences.english: Liverpool are set to outbid West Ham United for Lazio midfielder Valon Behrami.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦在對貝赫拉米的出價上擊敗了西漢姆聯。

sentences.english: Liverpool are reported to be lining up a move for highly-rated Rennes winger Sylvain Marveaux.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，利物浦看上了法甲雷恩隊的牛逼飛翼馬爾沃。

sentences.english: But Liverpool is abut more than music and sport.
sentences.chinese: 但是利物浦可不僅僅有音樂和體育。

sentences.english: Liverpool have spent a lot of money strengthening and will always be a threat.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦花了很多錢壯大隊伍，他們同樣是個威脅。

sentences.english: Liverpool are reportedly monitoring Valentin Stocker - with a view to making a January bid for the Swiss youngster.
sentences.chinese: 最近利物浦和瑞士小將斯托克爾聯繫在了一起。
